features: COOLING CLIP ON FAN - This clip on fan will keep you cool in any environment, fan comes with a 2 speed wind option, and can be adjusted up to a 180 angle up & down, and a 360 rotation, strong clamp grip enables you to clip it on your Bed, Desk, Table, etc a rubber attached to the clip will keep it sturdy & strong, clamp grip can open up to 2 inches, Clip on and feel the fresh cool breeze
2 SPEED WIND - this Nexair Clip-On Fan features a 2 wind power option, depending on your needs and the climate, adjust the speed to your need and enjoy the quiet and cooling breeze

ADJUST & MODIFY - Adjust the wind exactly to your need with its 180 degree adjustable tilt and its 360 full rotation, Clip it on your bed or desk direct it to your comfortability and have a relaxing full night of sleep, or a productive enjoyable day of work

STRONG GRIP - This Clip on Fan is made of Quality and Durable Material, and comes with a Strong rubber clamp, which opens up to 2 inches, that will hold strongly and firmly the fan on its position and give you the ultimate cooling stability needed

QUIET OPERATING - This quiet operating fan will make sure you can enjoy a full night of comfortable and quality sleep, or a full day of productive Work or Family time with a comfortable cooling breeze, without the disturbing noise of the AC or high velocity fans. Sit down, relax and clear your mind with an enjoyable cool & quiet breeze

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great Exactly what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Going on a trip, and I need white noise. Perfect amount of white noise, without being overwhelming. Nice breeze too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and breaks FAST
reviews.reviewText: ***UPDATE: today 01/09/2024 the company offered to refund my money. I’m updating my review to reflect the customer service as my purchase was beyond the refund date. I appreciate they want to make things right***I bought this fan two months ago and starting about three weeks into using it the fan began to make a terrible noise. The noise will come and go until today when it just stopped blowing air. I started using this fan November 4th of 2023 and today is December 30th for reference. In no way do I recommend this fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this fan
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased two of these fans, because after buying one a second child wanted one on their bed as well. They both use them overnight when sleeping and it keeps them comfortable throughout the night. It’s easy to turn on and off and tilts easily as well even my eight-year-old can do it. We have it clipped onto their bed which is made out of a 2 x 4 and it fits comfortably on there that I don’t have to worry about it coming off. We have these plugged into the wall. The cord could be a little longer, though especially because one of these has to be plugged in on a bunkbed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do NOT buy this fan.
reviews.reviewText: Right out of the box it worked well for 1 day. The second day when plugged in it started moving very slow. Then faster and then the speed it was set for, but it took 60 seconds to do so. It acted like it had a better connection. Then the next day the fan blade started to wobble instead of running smoot. Like it wasn't screwed in all the way. 2 days later it stopped working. Every once in a while it would run for about 10 or 15 seconds then stop again. I have been completely taken by these folks. Dont make the same mistake I did, buy a differant fan from a different company. Amazon should not let these people use Amazon to sell their cheap crap.DO NOT BUY THIS FAN!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Will become noisy!
reviews.reviewText: This may not happen for everyone. I clipped this fan onto a computer monitor in my office to keep cool during summer days. (My home lacks central air.). It was great in the beginning. Last night, I walked into my office (I had left this fan on all day, forgetting to turn it off), and was struck my a low level hummm noise that wasn't there before. Seems like before, all the noise it made was the sound of the air blowing... but it developed a noticeable motor noise coming from the housing. I might not bother many people. In fact, unless you work in a very silent area it might not bother you at all, but my hearing is very sensitive. I work with audio a lot and so any unnecessary noise bothers me. I don't think I have the box anymore so I won't bother returning it, but I may spend a bit more for another brand in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fans for the bunk beds
reviews.reviewText: We use these fans (bought two) for the kidʻs bunk beds. I bought these specifically because they were plug in. Other ones that were battery operated or rechargeable were not worth it. You need to buy these electric fans. They clip on side of bed, long cord and you donʻt need to worry about changing battery. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a great job
reviews.reviewText: My fan came with a cord and that is how I use it. No battery in this one. Price was great easy to use and does a very good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Working continuously without a hitch
reviews.reviewText: I bought a plant tent for my citrus and needed a fan to put inside. Didn't want to spend much and found this cheap. It has a clip so you can put it anywhere and it's flexible so you can angle it in a variety of directions. Put it in the tent w/the lights on a timer and it's been working 16 hrs a day since then w/o a hitch. It gives off enough air and isn't horribly loud. It's just another Chinese product, so many of which are absolute junk, but so far I am very pleased with this purchase.
